ygData.subject: Re: 2 questions about Jewelry
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Technically, yes, but I personally am not going to do it.  Example: Right now, my character s JewelCraft is at the point where I need to be working with
ygData.messageBody:
"DeGirolami, Franck" wrote:
> Question no1: will I need a better skill to combine Enchanted Electrum and
> Malachite ( 2.5 to 3 plats of components ) than to combine Enchanted Silver
> and Pearl ( dont remember the prices but around 20 plats ) ???

Technically, yes, but I personally am not going to do it. Example:
Right now, my character's JewelCraft is at the point where I need to be
working with jade. So, I'm gonna do that. But, after jade, I'm moving
to electrum. Anything above jade will be too expensive, even with
silver. Black pearl? 21 plat for me. RUBY? Oh hell no. 158 plat!!

> Question no2: will I need a better skill to combine Enchanted Silver with
> something than to combine regular silver with the same thing?

No, it should be the same difficulty.

E

-The Matrix

(but don't let The Tick hear of it)
